name: Wheels on the Adventure - Jam version
name_original: Wheels on the Adventure - Jam version
description:
A puzzle game where you place signs to steer the bus, gather passengers and send them on a faraway journey! Made for GameMaker Community Jam 45.

The game uses mostly mouse controls. Click on buttons, drag-and-drop building blocks, lead the bus(es) out of the map, collect passengers. More exact mechanics are explained in the tutorial pages.

Some keyboard controls are used for settings:
- M for toggling background music
- S for toggling the sounds (including the city noise loop)
- Alt + Enter to go fullscreen
- Alt + 1/2/3 to enter windowed mode with 960x540, 1280x720 and 1920x1080 resolutions respectively
